participant_1.background:
My car is a great place to enjoy my favorite barbecue recipes.
i ve been in a relationship for 2 years.
i am going to school to get my bachelors degree.
i love to play soccer.
i am good at throwing parties.

participant_2.background:
I once pretended to be a Jedi Knight to get out of a speeding ticket.
i simply walk around when i have nothing to do.
i watch south park at least once a day.
The weather is perfect for cheering!
we have two pets as well.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to?
Hi! Not much, just watching South Park. What about you?
I am getting ready for a party. I love throwing parties!
That sounds fun! I love parties too. I am good at pretending to be a Jedi Knight.
That's a cool talent! I love soccer. I play every weekend with my friends.
Soccer is so much fun! I wish I could play, but I have two pets that take up all my time.
Aww, that's too bad. What kind of pets do you have?
I have a dog and a cat. They are both really cute.
I love animals! I think they are so cute.
Me too! They are the best.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! What are you going to do after the party?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go to a movie or something.
That sounds like fun! I'm going to watch South Park and play with my pets.
